str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To stand fast, stand firm, persevere. From the perfect tense of histemi; to be stationary, i.e. to persevere.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
